name: UNIVERSITY OF KENTUCKY
sampleDescriptions: Advancement of university research and development goals
Advancement of university research and development goals, monitor congressional developments of Fiscal Year 2019 appropriations
Advancement of university research and development goals, monitor congressional developments of Fiscal Year 2020 appropriations
Advancement of university research and development goals, monitor congressional developments of Fiscal Year 2021 appropriations
Advancement of university research and development goals, monitor congressional developments of Fiscal Year 2022 appropriations
Advancement of university research and development goals, monitor congressional developments of Fiscal Year 2023 appropriations
Advancement of university research and development goals, monitor congressional developments of Fiscal Year 2025 appropriations
Advancement of university research and development goals and monitor congressional developments regarding budget reconciliation.

Advancement of university research and development goals through the FY26 Department of Defense Appropriations Act, the FY26 Commerce, Justice, Science Appropriations Act, the FY26 Energy and Water Development Appropriations Act, and the FY26 Labor, Health and Human Services and Education Appropriations Act.
